title: When i open patcher , it doesnt show up the launch option and seconds later it bugsplat.
body: When i open patcher , it doesnt show up the launch option and seconds later it bugsplat. I already did everything that riot have in the game crash section, please help.

replies.body: The launcher failing to launch with a bugsplat could be due to a patching issue that didn't update properly.  I suggest using our[ patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to review any potentially corrupt files.  It's also important that your OS is granting the game access to launch, and our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help adjust your setting to make sure of that.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Nothing helped , like I said in the post, i already unnistaled with your hextech repair tool and now it opens , dont show the launch button and bug splat...

If the steps in the guide didn't get this resolved, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this.  Attach the logs obtained through the hextech tool to the ticket for context, and we'll figure out what's going on.  We'll respond to the ticket as soon as we can!
Thank you! If the problem continue, i'll let you know! <3
